summary: P1 (UI Style Templates) & P2 (Retail Inventory Management) testing complete. All 12 backend API tests passed. Frontend verified: Admin login works, Inventory tab loads with stats cards and product table, Stock Adjust dialog functions correctly, UI Style templates apply CSS variables in both light and dark modes.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style returns default style with template and colors (no auth)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/ui-style saves template change to 'elegant' (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style reflects the saved 'elegant' template after admin save
Backend: PUT /api/admin/ui-style resets template back to 'default' (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/dashboard returns total_products, total_stock, total_value, low_stock, out_of_stock (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/products returns product list with stock data (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/products?stock_filter=out returns only out-of-stock products (admin auth)
Backend: POST /api/store/inventory/adjust adds stock to a product and returns old/new quantity (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/movements returns adjustment as movement entry (admin auth)
Backend: POST /api/store/inventory/adjust removes stock from a product (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/alerts returns low-stock products with threshold=50 (admin auth)
Backend: Inventory dashboard requires authentication (401 without auth)
Frontend: Home page at / loads correctly with module status badges (Live Beta, Coming Soon)
Frontend: Admin login at /admin/login works with admin@libreria.com/admin
Frontend: Unatienda > Inventory tab loads with 5 stats cards (Total Products, Total Stock, Stock Value, Low Stock, Out of Stock)
Frontend: Inventory tab shows product table with 5 products, prices, stock quantities, status badges
Frontend: Stock Adjust dialog opens when clicking Adjust button on product
Frontend: Adjust dialog has Add Stock/Remove buttons, Quantity input, Reason dropdown, Notes field
Frontend: UI Style CSS variables apply correctly in light mode (--background: 40 20% 97%)
Frontend: Dark mode toggle works and applies dark CSS variables (--background: 222 47% 11%)
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: ESLint warnings for missing dependencies in useEffect/useCallback hooks in InventoryTab.jsx and UnatiendaModule.jsx - non-blocking but should be addressed
Minor: Console warning 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in TableBody from CatalogoPublicoTab - should add key prop to list items
seed_data_creation: None - used existing products in store_products collection. 5 products available with inventory quantities.

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are real. No mocked endpoints.

context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 UI Style Templates and P2 Inventory Management fully tested. UI Style: GET /api/public/ui-style returns style object with template (default/elegant/warm/ocean/minimal), primary_color, font_family, border_radius, card_style. PUT /api/admin/ui-style updates style. ThemeContext.js fetches UI style on mount and applies via applyUIStyle() which sets CSS variables for both light and dark modes. Inventory: GET /api/store/inventory/dashboard returns stats. GET /api/store/inventory/products supports search, stock_filter (all/low/out/in), sort_by, sort_dir. POST /api/store/inventory/adjust adjusts stock with book_id, quantity_change (positive=add, negative=remove), reason, notes. GET /api/store/inventory/movements returns history. GET /api/store/inventory/alerts returns low-stock products. InventoryTab.jsx is the 3rd tab in Unatienda module.
